---
name: "git-conventions"
description: "Repository Git and commit message conventions, including Conventional Commits guidance."
applyTo: "**/*"
---

# Git Conventions

- Use conventional commits: `type(scope): subject`.
- Branch naming: `feature/`, `fix/`, `chore/`, `hotfix/` as appropriate.
- Include a short PR description and link to related ticket.
# Git Conventions

- Use conventional commits: `type(scope): subject`.
- Branch naming: `feature/`, `fix/`, `chore/`, `hotfix/` as appropriate.
- Include a short PR description and link to related ticket.
